reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas well-made, comfortable, and super soft with a luxurious feel, appreciating the multiple pieces included for the price. The fit and appearance receive positive feedback, with one customer noting the tank top is wider at the top. Regarding size and material quality, opinions are mixed - while some find them sized right and appreciate the nice silk material, others report they run too small

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Set
items.body: I was a little skeptical about purchasing the silk pajamas BUT h the eh turned out super comfy. The set doesnâ€™t feel cheap against the skin. They are comfortable and the Large size fit me perfectly. I am 5â€™2 and 170 lbs. I washed them before my first use and they washed nicely and didnâ€™t suffer any damage. They are cute and the waist is stretchy. Read more
items.author: Jessica9393

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Pajamas!
items.body: Lovely pajama set! I love that it comes with 3 pairs and the robe is a great extra. They are very soft and breathable for hot sleepers. Read more
items.author: Abbey Lenhart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and attractive
items.body: Fitts perfect , nice silk material , great night time wear . Husband loved it Read more
items.author: PF

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Set For The Price
items.body: This 5-piece set (robe, nightgown, two pairs of pants, and a top) is a great value for the price. The fabric feels smooth, soft, and comfortable against the skin, and the overall quality is decent enough. My only issue is with the robe â€” when tied in the front, the belt doesnâ€™t stay securely in place, which makes it less practical than Iâ€™d like. Other than that, itâ€™s a lovely set and worth considering. Read more
items.author: Kimberly C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Donâ€™t pass these up!
items.body: Great deal for the price! Exactly what I wanted! Iâ€™m not sure about sizing as my body does not usually fit typical size guidelines so I have to make adjustments (take them in etc) but this set fits perfectly! Only adjustment was the adjustable straps. Color was exactly as expected. The comfort makes me not want to take them off! Read more
items.author: Wendyllanne Bee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing Slip
items.body: The items I received were decent quality and color was just as pictured, however, I never got the slip with it. Read more
items.author: Amber Keeler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item! Will buy more!!!
items.body: I love the versatility I get with this pj set and it feels so comfortable! I hand wash them and hang them to dry and they dry so quickly!!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and in love
items.body: Fits very well, stretches in the right spots and I have confidence it wonâ€™t rip. Super cute and stylish for sleepðŸ˜‚ lightweight too Read more

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Wine Red, Pink, Black, Champagne, Green, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
